response.original_title: THE VIOLENT HOMICIDAL SERIAL KILLER TAPE RETURNS!
response.overview: 5 Years after the original, Poser-Rot Video and ExhumedVHS present over 30 demented, murderous, stop motion skits of pure depravity shot on a VHS camcorder! Watch in horror as, The Violent Homicidal Serial Killer Tape stabs, slashes, bludgeons, shoots, runs over and executes victims!
response.title: THE VIOLENT HOMICIDAL SERIAL KILLER TAPE RETURNS!
